## Config.Default.LanguagePriorityQualifiers variable

Qualifier definitions in which language is the primary qualifier, with territory as a secondary qualifier.

**Signature:**

```typescript
LanguagePriorityQualifiers: ReadonlyArray<Qualifiers.IQualifierDecl>
```

## Remarks

The default qualifiers are: - language(token: lang): language qualifier, priority 850 - currentTerritory(token: geo): territory qualifier, priority 800
